full_summary:
# Request for Proposal (RFP): Maintenance of Electronic Security System Equipment
## Title
Title: RFP Maintenance of Electronic Security System equipment 21120-236472
( Equivalent title in French: DDP Entretien d’équipement du système de sécurité électronique 21120-236472 )

## Tender Details
* Amendment number: 9
* Solicitation number: WS4365275858
* Publication date: 2024-01-11
* Closing date: 2024-04-12T14:00:00
* Last amendment date: 2024-04-10
* Expected contract start date: 2024-04-01
* Expected contract end date: None
* Tender status: Expired
* UNSPSC codes: 72151500, 72151700 ( services related to electrical system and safety and security system installation services

## Procurement Details
* Negotiation status: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Trade Agreements: The contract may be subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, etc. (Please refer to the official sources for the list of trade agreements.

## Bidding Requirements
* End user: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Roles and responsibilities of the contractor are to provide technical support and maintenance services to ensure the quality and effectiveness of CSC electronic security systems and associated components. 
* The Scope of Work will include the provision of technical support and maintenance services delivered to ensure the quality and effectiveness of CSC electronic security systems and associated components. 
* Duration of the contract: four (4) years, with an option to extend for three (3) additional years. 

## Requirements Associated with the Tender
Proceed with care, as this tender is subject to security requirements. You must read the entire tender documentation prior to participating. You can refer to the official online tender posting for more information. 

## Contractor’s Contact Details
To ask a question or enquire about the tender, please contact Maxime Dallaire at maxime.dallaire@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. The contact information of all bidders must be submitted prior to the award.
